home.title: Route On Wheels | Explore Tours, Destinations & Travel Blogs
home.description: Discover transformative travel experiences across India with Route On Wheels. Explore spiritual journeys, eco-conscious tours, and authentic adventures that connect you with nature and culture.

about.title: About Us | Route On Wheels
about.description: Learn about Route On Wheels - Founded by Vivek Rauthan & Ashishta Negi with 12-15 years of experience in Indian tourism. We create sustainable, transformative travel experiences.
about.keywords: about route on wheels, vivek rauthan, sustainable tourism, responsible travel india, travel company india

tours.keywords: India tours, spiritual tours, eco-tourism, adventure travel, pilgrimage tours, cultural tours india

contact.title: Contact Us | Route On Wheels
